${ModID}:RestingSlayerCutscene.NAME: Resting slayer Cutscene
BLOCKING_TEXTS: "I'm staying here to rest a bit more, maybe I'll see you at the top!"
DESCRIPTIONS: "Hello fellow Slayer, how are you doing?"
"I'm taking a small break from climbing the spire here at the Cafe, perhaps we can make a trade?"
The two of you make your trade and go your own ways. Surely you will regain what you lost again?
"If you change your mind, I'll be resting here a little longer."
OPTIONS: I'm happy with what I have now.
